content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the complex motivation of the rebel contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the complex motivation of the rebel contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
